nodes.bodyText: Flagging for review, wasn't sure how to do this via ACRA as we don't have an exception.
You can sendExceptionReport with a new Exception instantiated right there
I'll add a helper function. Let's flag as awaiting feedback
sendExceptionReport is already a helper function :-), just do a new Exception("my cool message") right inside of it and you're set
Issue found: JUnit tests should include assert() or fail()
Issue found: JUnit tests should include assert() or fail()
